title: Decanter from "The Cocktail Hour Set"
text: One of Russel Wright's first designs, the cocktail hour set was made in pewter and aluminum. This is one of the most complete sets known. In keeping with the 1930s machine-age aesthetic, the cocktail-shaker's form recalls a piston or a ____.
description: Spun aluminum with wrap-around cork; decanter has lid and strainer
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
